review: Love it , only had for two weeks and ....LOVE IT
author: still waiting

review: Works great just want we needed
author: jbdaiello

review: Works great to stream video from multiple sources; super convenient for those who subscribe to multiple services.
author: Pen Name

review: I'm totally happy with my purchase.
author: Michael Martini

review: Sometimes the sound will keep going, but the picture pauses.  Not sure if that is a flaw or if 4 people running off the WiFi at the same time affects it.  I just back out to the home button & reopen and it works fine again. Love it, can access my Amazon, Netflix, Hulu and Prime.
author: Rusty B

review: Like it a lot. Definitely worth the money! HBO streaming buffers a lot.
author: Christina

review: Very easy to install and use.  Works better than I expected.
author: R. Mark Thornton

review: Very slow loading at times.  Sometimes pauses in middle movie tor reload or advises to check wireless connection.  When connection is checked it shows to be strong connection and ok.
author: Amazon Customer

review: This is my new favorite thing! I am a movie junkie, and being able to link my prime, netflix, hbo, showtime, and starz all into one place, with one remote.....Amazing! I would have paid over $100 for something like this, and I can't believe it was only $39! It only took like 15 minutes to set up & link all of the accounts to it too. I highly recommend this product.
author: James Farmer
